name: Mompreneur: Pizza Cooking Life Sim
description:
In this fun story-driven simslike cooking game, you start out as a new single mom, who just broke up with her boyfriend. As you move into a new apartment, you have to take care of your baby and your needs by interacting with different objects.

Earn money to pay rent, buy food and baby products. Since you have worked at an aunt’s pizzeria in the past, you decide to start your own home catering business. Every food order comes with a unique story, so you will meet many interesting characters.

You also need to attend to your personal life, as you start to receive e-mails from your mom, your ex-boyfriend, your girlfriends and even a new love interest.
Sometimes you have to make a choice to let a new story unfold. Will you forgive to your baby’s father or will you find new love? Can you make your business work or do you have to move back with your parents? You decide your story.

COOKING FEATURES:

  • Cook delicious pizzas and burgers!
  • Over 100 customers with unique stories and personalities.
  • Upgrade your business and buy tasty pizza and burger toppings.
  • Pizza toppings: from classic sausage, pepperoni and onions to vegan seitan!
  • Earn more money with correct orders!
  • Burgers: from classic beef patty to fish and veggie patties.

STORY FEATURES:

  • Design your apartment.
  • Take care of your baby and your needs.
  • Go on dates and find love!
